claims.claim: Ferrari's fan base has tripled in the last 3 years
claims.quote: This fan base has been growing at a rapid clip, it has tripled in the last 3 years alone and its composition has also evolved.

claims.claim: The platform serves 396 million fans worldwide
claims.quote: Using generative AI, the platform transforms the torrent of track data and data from various other sources into a personalized and interactive mobile app experience for Scuderia Ferrari HP's 396 million fans around the world around the clock, 365 days a year.

claims.claim: Post-race recaps are now available within hours of race finish
claims.quote: These post-race recaps of the Scuderia Ferrari HP team's performance are now available for fans within hours of a race finish.

claims.claim: Infrastructure total cost of ownership reduced from 70% to 40%
claims.quote: We've reduced the total cost of ownership for our infrastructure from 70 percent to 40 percent

claims.claim: Product lifecycle management simulations run 60% faster
claims.quote: For example, the company can run simulations in its product lifecycle management software 60 percent faster than before.

claims.claim: Car configurator increased sales leads and reduced configuration times by 20%
claims.quote: Since rolling out the car configurator, Ferrari has increased its sales leads and reduced configuration times by 20 percent by offering a more personalized experience
